summary.overview: This batch job processes account master data from a VSAM file and transforms it into three different sequential file formats to support various downstream processing and reporting requirements in the CardDemo application.
business_functions: Clean up existing output files to ensure fresh data processing
Read account master data from VSAM account file
Transform account data into compressed format for efficient processing
Generate array-structured account data for organized data access
Create variable-length account records for flexible data storage
Catalog processed account files for downstream business applications

READACCT.jcl.program_overview: Processes account data and creates multiple output formats
Assembly utility for data formatting operations

datasource_summary.name: Account Data - Physical Sequential Compressed (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.PSCOMP)
datasource_summary.function: Stores processed account data in compressed format for reporting and analysis purposes

datasource_summary.name: Account Data - Array Physical Sequential (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.ARRYPS)
datasource_summary.function: Contains account data organized in array format for batch processing and data transfer operations

datasource_summary.name: Account Data - Variable Block Physical Sequential (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VBPS)
datasource_summary.business_name: Account Data - Variable Block Physical Sequential
datasource_summary.function: Stores account data in variable-length format optimized for space efficiency and flexible record structures

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Program Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LOADLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains executable programs and modules required for card demo application processing

datasource_summary.name: Account Master Data (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.ACCTDATA.VSAM.KSDS)
datasource_summary.function: Master repository of customer account information including account details, balances, and customer data

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    CBACT01C.cbl["Processes account data and creates multiple output formats (CBACT01C.cbl) "]
    COBDATFT.asm["Assembly utility for data formatting operations (COBDATFT.asm) "]
    CBACT01C.cbl --> COBDATFT.asm
